com.matrixone.apps.domain.threadpool
Class DefaultThreadPool

java.lang.Object
  com.matrixone.apps.domain.threadpool.DefaultThreadPool
All Implemented Interfaces:
ThreadPool, java.lang.Runnable
public class DefaultThreadPool
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, ThreadPool

A default implementation of a ThreadPool which is constructed with a given number of threads.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $
Author:
James Strachan
